Package src.controllers

Class CinemaController

java.lang.Object
src.controllers.CinemaController
public class CinemaController extends Object
Controller for cinema. Reads/writes from cinema database and manages seats. manages the seats that are occupied by customers and stores them in database.
Since:
2022-11-13

      public HashMap<String,ArrayList<Seat>> getSeatsFromDB(ArrayList<Movie> movies, HashMap<String,ArrayList<LocalDateTime>> showtimes)
